name: Faithful Friend
description:
Faithful Friend

My name is Max, since Hogan came into my life I have never felt alone.

Support me

I'm a solo developer working on my free time in my "Faithful Friend" project. The game is free for anyone to enjoy, and if you want to make a donation to support my work it will be of great help to me. If you'd like to support me financially, consider leaving a donation in PayPal. It would also be helpful if you consider sharing the game with your friends and family.

Fundraising

The fundraising will be done through the platform of PayPal. The financing will end on February 6, 2020. If the game receives enough financial support I will finish the development of the videogame. The decision is in your hands.

DONATE

Rewards

#CONTRIBUTIONREWARD1$5 or more.You have my sincere gratitude.2$30 or more.Your name will appear on the credits.

When you have made a donation, send an 

email to: jcontrygames@outlook.com

with a screenshot and your name to verify the information.

Website

https://j-contry-games.webnode.es/
